Class Flight

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Collision
          Enemy
              Flight

public class Flight
extends Enemy

A flying-type enemy. Flies for 50 to 200 acts every time, then rests for 50 to 200 acts. At the beginning of every move, it chooses a random direction to fly in. If it encounters a tile, it will turn around.

Version:
Jan 19
Author:
Jerry Xu
